MajorClaims.MC2: it is very important to be confident of the information, which you use, especially when your conclusion or decision may have a great influence

Claims.C1: by using different sources of information we can guarantee its reliability
Claims.C2: you have to look through different sources before you manage to find some reliable facts

Premises.P1: Some people may disinform you on purpose, that's why it is rather unwise to make conclusions before you are confident of the information
Premises.P2: Russian news announced that the war between Osetia and Georgia had been initiated by Georgia, however, european news announced that it was initiated by Russia
Premises.P3: After a while the situation became clear, but before that a lot of people had already condemned the actions of Russia
Premises.P4: It is possible to make a wrong decision
Premises.P5: you have just used someone's personal opinion as a source of information, but it was actually wrong
Premises.P6: several years ago in Moscow salt became two times more expensive only in one week, because people thought that soon there would be no salt in the shops
Premises.P7: The gossip-based information dramatically influenced the prices and only after official announcement the "salt-panic" was over
Premises.P8: it is very important to know facts about some events or problem, not only estimations
Premises.P9: it can help you to make your own conclusion or estimate
